casebody.data:
No. 10-142. Michael Joseph Singleton, Petitioner v. California. 562 U.S. 895, 131 S. Ct. 322,

178 L. Ed. 2d 145,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6361. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the Court of Appeal of California, Second Appellate District, denied.

Same case below, 182 Cal. App. 4th 1, 105 Cal. Rptr. 3d 628.
